Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29933 affecting package clang16 for versions less than 16.0.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29933 affecting package clang16 for versions less than 16.0.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package clang16 is earlier than 16.0.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-29933
